Quote: I play- it's kind of like a slice-of-life, LA women in their forties, playing forty kind of what's their friendship like, and what's their life like and so I just play one of the four friends.

Author: Sonakshi Sinha
Quote: I am aloof by nature. I mind my own business. I'm good with everyone, and I get along fine with people. But work is work, and friendship is friendship. I never mix the two.

Author: Trey Anastasio
Quote: Things have gone beyond my wildest expectations and dreams, and I feel like I've been given so many blessings in my life, between my friendship with the guys in the band, our wonderful audience, being able to play this music, and then my family.

Author: Laura Riding
Quote: Because most people are not sufficiently employed in themselves, they run about loose, hungering for employment, and satisfy themselves in various supererogatory occupations. The easiest of these occupations, which have all to do with making things already made, is the making of people: it is called the art of friendship.

Author: Debra Messing
Quote: I come from the New York theatre world, and I have a lot of gay male friends, so this friendship of Will and Grace's isn't such a stretch.

Author: Bradley Chicho
Quote: Blunders, no, only friendship binds us to honesty - attracting crypts of mushrooms in the wake of our snowboards.

Author: Marilyn Hacker
Quote: You are almost not free, if you are teaching a group of graduate students, to become friends with one of them. I don't mean anything erotically charged, just a friendship.

Author: Major Taylor
Quote: In closing I wish to say that while I was sorely beset by a number of white riders in my racing days, I have also enjoyed the friendship of countless thousands of white men whom I class as among my closest friends.

Author: St. Jerome
Quote: The friendship that can cease has never been real.

Author: Tahar Ben Jelloun
Quote: I love life in spite of all that mars it. I love friendship, jokes and laughter.

Author: Dennis Prager
Quote: Our scientific age demands that we provide definitions, measurements, and statistics in order to be taken seriously. Yet most of the important things in life cannot be precisely defined or measured. Can we define or measure love, beauty, friendship, or decency, for example?

Author: Mariella Frostrup
Quote: Sustaining true friendship is a lot more challenging than we give it credit for.

Author: Martin Freeman
Quote: I think what 'The Hobbit' and Middle-earth deal in are quite universal and timeless themes of honour and love and friendship... so they're things that do resonate with people.

Author: Anne Lamott
Quote: My parents, and librarians along the way, taught me about the space between words; about the margins, where so many juicy moments of life and spirit and friendship could be found. In a library, you could find miracles and truth and you might find something that would make you laugh so hard that you get shushed, in the friendliest way.

Author: Jonathan Edwards
Quote: Sincere friendship towards God, in all who believe him to be properly an intelligent, willing being, does most apparently, directly, and strongly incline to prayer; and it no less disposes the heart strongly to desire to have our infinitely glorious.

Author: Christie Brinkley
Quote: Share your smile with the world. It's a symbol of friendship and peace.

Author: Tom Lehrer
Quote: My last public performance for money was in 1967. For free, it was 1972, with the exception of two little one-shot, one-song things. But that's just for friends, out of friendship for the people involved, and also because it was fun.

Author: Chester A. Arthur
Quote: As is natural with contiguous states having like institutions and like aims of advancement and development, the friendship of the United States and Mexico has been constantly maintained.

Author: Dave Blood
Quote: We became friends as we became a band. Our friendship evolved as the band evolved. It had its ups and downs, but it was mostly ups for the four of us. We got along well almost all of the time. Hey! We liked each other and we still do.

Author: Thomas Moore
Quote: A friendship that like love is warm; A love like friendship, steady.

Author: Alfred A. Montapert
Quote: All lasting business is built on friendship.

Author: Aristotle
Quote: Perfect friendship is the friendship of men who are good, and alike in excellence; for these wish well alike to each other qua good, and they are good in themselves.

Author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld
Quote: However rare true love may be, it is less so than true friendship.

Author: Michel de Montaigne
Quote: If there is such a thing as a good marriage, it is because it resembles friendship rather than love.

Author: William Blake
Quote: Opposition is true friendship.

Author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld
Quote: What men have called friendship is only a social arrangement, a mutual adjustment of interests, an interchange of services given and received; it is, in sum, simply a business from which those involved propose to derive a steady profit for their own self-love.

Author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge
Quote: Friendship is a sheltering tree.

Author: Emily Bronte
Quote: Love is like the wild rose-briar; Friendship like the holly-tree. The holly is dark when the rose-briar blooms, but which will bloom most constantly?

Author: Thomas Jefferson
Quote: Peace and friendship with all mankind is our wisest policy, and I wish we may be permitted to pursue it.

Author: Albert Camus
Quote: Friendship often ends in love, but love in friendship - never.

Author: Epicurus
Quote: Of all the things which wisdom provides to make us entirely happy, much the greatest is the possession of friendship.

Author: Harbhajan Singh
Quote: I define friendship as a bond that transcends all barriers. When you are ready to expect anything and everything from friends, good, bad or ugly... that's what I call true friendship.

Author: Robert Southey
Quote: No distance of place or lapse of time can lessen the friendship of those who are thoroughly persuaded of each other's worth.

Author: Marie de France
Quote: If one of two lovers is loyal, and the other jealous and false, how may their friendship last, for Love is slain!

Author: Bradley Chicho
Quote: The joys of friendship inert the heart and fizzy home bouncing jubilantly with laughter-buttered love.

Author: Max von Sydow
Quote: No doubt, the most important thing in my career was my time with Mr. Bergman, with whom I worked in so many films and also in so many stage productions, so it was a continuous working relationship and also a friendship, of course, that lasted for so many years.

Author: Hubert H. Humphrey
Quote: The greatest gift of life is friendship, and I have received it.

Author: Stephanie Tubbs Jones
Quote: My reputation is too important to put it aside for purposes of some friendship. We have a job to do.

Author: Abby Wambach
Quote: It's always really challenging trying to go from player to player/coach. You have a kind of friendship basis of relationship with all of your teammates, and now you go to this power position where you have to make decisions that might hurt people's feelings.

Author: Patrick O'Brian
Quote: Likings arise when one has no earthly reason for liking - the most wildly improbable marriages and uncommon friendship.

Author: Sharon Horgan
Quote: I despise shows that present friendship where you're always there for each other and really strong because I don't know anyone like that. I mean, I've got great friends, but I can go months without seeing them because I think, 'I just can't deal with having to give you anything.'

Author: Li Keqiang
Quote: When it comes to Pakistan, the first word that comes to the mind of the Chinese is 'iron brother.' To us Chinese, Pakistan is always a trustworthy friend who is as solid as iron. Actually, Chinese netizens refer to Pakistan as 'Iron Pak.' This testifies to the strength of China-Pakistan friendship.

Author: Atifete Jahjaga
Quote: The ideal of all Kosovo is membership in the E.U. and a permanent friendship with the United States. I believe and I am convinced our dreams will come true.

Author: June Jordan
Quote: But, based on my friendship with Evie as young mothers, I started going on freedom rides in 1966.

Author: Dan Fouts
Quote: One of the great things personally coming to Hawai'i is my friendship of Jim Nicholson.

Author: Gerard Arpey
Quote: This airline is grateful for his extensive contributions and we will miss his friendship and support. We extend our deepest sympathies to the Casey family on its personal loss.

Author: Jennifer Beals
Quote: It became very clear to the director that it would be foolish not to use our friendship. I had tried to talk to him about it because all the relationships in the film are so, not negative, but antagonistic. There's not a lot of love going around.

Author: Charles R. Swindoll
Quote: I cannot even imagine where I would be today were it not for that handful of friends who have given me a heart full of joy. Let's face it, friends make life a lot more fun.

Author: Jason Dolley
Quote: I think faith helps me a lot. God wants you to be where He wants you to be, and that's where I want to be. If I do not get a part, I understand that maybe I needed to be home at that time, maybe in school; there's always a reason. My faith is also where my core friends are, at my church, a faith-based friendship.

Author: Jeff Cohen
Quote: Richard Donner's friendship and guidance showed me that there's more to life than being an actor.

Author: Eric Massa
Quote: Here's a news flash: No soldier gives his life. That's not the way it works. Most soldiers who make a conscious decision to place themselves in harm's way do it to protect their buddies. They do it because of the bonds of friendship - and it goes so much deeper than friendship.

Author: Lou Holtz
Quote: When the bank asks me about my assets, I include my friendship with Regis Philbin.

Author: Neale Donald Walsch
Quote: As told in Friendship with God, if we simply decided to believe and act as if first, we're all one, and second, life is eternal, it would render virtually everything we've done all our lives pointless.

Author: Marquis de Lafayette
Quote: I experience for the American officers and soldiers that friendship which arises from having shared with them for a length of time dangers, sufferings, and both good and evil fortune.

Author: Marquis de Lafayette
Quote: Never was a man further from a partiality for Spain than I am. But I think I now have left them in a sincere and steady intention to cultivate the friendship of America.

Author: Hanya Yanagihara
Quote: Friendship is one of our most treasured relationships, but it isn't codified and celebrated; it's never going to give you a party.

Author: Michael Dirda
Quote: I find that the Amazon comments often are exceptionally shrewd and insightful, so I'm not going to diss them. But you don't really have any guarantees that what you're reading wasn't written out of friendship or spite.

Author: Kaley Cuoco
Quote: I firmly believe, only because I've been doing this for so long, every show takes three years. 90% of them don't get three years. It just does. It takes a long time to build a community, build a friendship with your characters. It's hard for people to grasp on and make them care about you.

Author: Elie Wiesel
Quote: Friendship marks a life even more deeply than love. Love risks degenerating into obsession, friendship is never anything but sharing.

Author: Lynn Coady
Quote: There was a time when I thought dudes had friendship all figured out. The focus on eating things in front of giant screens, pretending to punch one another, competing over who can utter the grossest and most profane personal insults imaginable - this struck me as the very apex of human social exchange.

Author: Douglas Brinkley
Quote: If Reagan had intelligence information that showed that the upheaval in Egypt is actually Democratic in spirit, then he would have, I believe, turned his back on Mubarak, even though there's a long friendship between the United States and Egypt.

Author: Hanya Yanagihara
Quote: I think for a lot of people, friendship is a relationship that gets devalued once they move on to what people consider to be more important relationships: once you find a partner or when you have kids.

Author: Hanya Yanagihara
Quote: In a basic sense, 'A Little Life' is a homage to how my friends and I live our lives. I wanted to push past the definitions of how we typically define friendship. It's a different version of adulthood, but it's no less important and no less legitimate than anyone else's.

Author: Lou Boudreau
Quote: Yeah, I miss it. You don't just break off a friendship you've had with a sport, and with all those you've met all over the country. We've got some friends, some very close friends, and you just sit back and think how fortunate you were having a career like that. And, actually, there's nothing in the game of baseball that hasn't happened to me.

Author: Martin Freeman
Quote: I think people just like seeing friendship. I think people like seeing people who just drive each other up the wall, but at same time, can't live without each other.

Author: John Mayall
Quote: Working with people, the musical part is one thing but the personal part is totally different and just as critical. If the friendship is there and it's a lasting friendship, then it will take care of itself.

Author: Anton Chekhov
Quote: Love, friendship and respect do not unite people as much as a common hatred for something.

Author: Joshua Prager
Quote: We have to rise above bad fortune. We have to be in the good and enjoy the good, study and work and adventure and friendship and community and love.

Author: Ernie Banks
Quote: Loyalty and friendship, which is to me the same, created all the wealth that I've ever thought I'd have.

Author: Hill Harper
Quote: You can't build anything with a flimsy foundation. Friendship is the foundation.

Author: Jean de La Fontaine
Quote: Rare as is true love, true friendship is rarer.

Author: Jared Kushner
Quote: The only things that are really permanent are love, family, friendship, and that is a lesson. At the end of the day, that's really what it boils down to. The rest of it is just stuff.

Author: Hayao Miyazaki
Quote: Watching John Lasseter's films, I think I can understand better than anyone that what he's doing, is going straight ahead with his vision and working really hard to get that vision into film form. And I feel that my understanding this of him is my friendship towards him.

Author: Henry Adams
Quote: One friend in a lifetime is much, two are many, three are hardly possible. Friendship needs a certain parallelism of life, a community of thought, a rivalry of aim.

Author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge
Quote: Love is flower like; Friendship is like a sheltering tree.

Author: Greg Graffin
Quote: In the family, in interpersonal relationships, even in friendship, faith is tremendously important. If you have a partner who you believe is a good person, then it is your duty to have faith in them until the end, despite the fact that they might have done some bad things. And you have to support and believe in your children.

Author: Bidzina Ivanishvili
Quote: Restoration of friendship with Russia, our biggest neighbor, is necessary for our peace and economy.

Author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez
Quote: She discovered with great delight that one does not love one's children just because they are one's children but because of the friendship formed while raising them.

Author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge
Quote: Sympathy constitutes friendship; but in love there is a sort of antipathy, or opposing passion. Each strives to be the other, and both together make up one whole.

Author: Cornelius Vanderbilt
Quote: There is no friendship in trade.

Author: John Tyler
Quote: So far as it depends on the course of this government, our relations of good will and friendship will be sedulously cultivated with all nations.

Author: William Hazlitt
Quote: To be capable of steady friendship or lasting love, are the two greatest proofs, not only of goodness of heart, but of strength of mind.

Author: Charlotte Bronte
Quote: If we would build on a sure foundation in friendship, we must love friends for their sake rather than for our own.

Author: Alana Stewart
Quote: One hopes, of course, that a relationship grows and becomes a deep and wonderful marriage and friendship that lasts forever. But that's not always the case.

Author: Clayton Christensen
Quote: The first two lessons, which we learned early in our efforts to be good member missionaries, have made sharing the Gospel much easier: We simply can't predict who will or won't be interested in the Gospel, and building a friendship is not a prerequisite to inviting people to learn about the Gospel.

Author: Lincoln Chafee
Quote: Israelis can be proud of the vibrant democracy that they have created, and I know that many Rhode Islanders share my deep appreciation for the close friendship between our two nations.

Author: Andrew Sullivan
Quote: What gay culture is before it is anything else, before it is a culture of desire or a culture of subversion or a culture of pain, is a culture of friendship.

Author: Ernie Banks
Quote: But it all comes down to friendship, treating people right.

Author: Petrarch
Quote: Suspicion is the cancer of friendship.

Author: John Wooden
Quote: Friendship is two-sided. It isn't a friend just because someone's doing something nice for you. That's a nice person. There's friendship when you do for each other. It's like marriage - it's two-sided.

Author: Gertrude Stein
Quote: Before the flowers of friendship faded friendship faded.

Author: Georg Brandes
Quote: My first experiences of academic friendship made me smile in after years when I looked back on them. But my circle of acquaintances had gradually grown so large that it was only natural new friendships should grow out of it.

Author: Eve Arnold
Quote: If the chemistry is right between star and photographer and the geometry of the pictures pleases the star, often the two people end up with a long-term professional friendship during which they continue to work together and to produce highly personal images.

Author: Rahul Dravid
Quote: What drew me towards team sport were the camaraderie and friendship. The chance to celebrate victory and success with a group of other people is something I have enjoyed doing.

Author: Charles de Montesquieu
Quote: Friendship is an arrangement by which we undertake to exchange small favors for big ones.

Author: Trent Reznor
Quote: When David Fincher called me up a few years ago and said, 'Hey, I'd like you to score this film 'The Social Network,' I said, 'I'm flattered, but I really don't have any real experience scoring films, and I'd rather not screw it up on a high-profile project. And I like you and I don't want to compromise our friendship.'

Author: Joyce Carol Oates
Quote: Primarily, 'Black Girl/White Girl' is the story of two very different, yet somehow 'fated' girls; for Genna, her 'friendship' with Minette is the most haunting of her life, though it is one-sided and ends in tragedy.

Author: Charles de Lint
Quote: Often the magical elements in my books are standing in for elements of the real world, the small and magical-in-their-own-right sorts of things that we take for granted and no longer pay attention to, like the bonds of friendship that entwine our own lives with those of other people and places.

Author: Jessye Norman
Quote: I have enjoyed most particularly reading the correspondence between Gustav Mahler and Richard Strauss. The genuine friendship, competitiveness and support that thread through their communications are life lessons for us all.

Author: Samuel Butler
Quote: Friendship is like money, easier made than kept.

Author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.
Quote: Acquaintances we meet, enjoy, and can easily leave behind; but friendship grows deep roots.

Author: Pietro Aretino
Quote: I keep my friends as misers do their treasure, because, of all the things granted us by wisdom, none is greater or better than friendship.

Author: Henry David Thoreau
Quote: I had three chairs in my house; one for solitude, two for friendship, three for society.

Author: William Hazlitt
Quote: Even in the common affairs of life, in love, friendship, and marriage, how little security have we when we trust our happiness in the hands of others!

Author: Jane Austen
Quote: Business, you know, may bring you money, but friendship hardly ever does.

Author: Victoria Justice
Quote: If you're going through friendship issues, I would say, first of all take a step back. How important is the friendship to you? Sometimes, if someone's not being a good friend to you and isn't treating you the way you should be treated, then you kind of have to move on sometimes.

Author: Mao Zedong
Quote: The differences between friends cannot but reinforce their friendship.

Author: Courteney Cox
Quote: I've got some great guy friends. They can start out as crushes. But when you realize something isn't going to happen, you make a choice whether or not the friendship is worth it. And it usually is. Then you can laugh about the fact that you used to have a crush on him or he had one on you.

Author: John Cusack
Quote: I force people to have coffee with me, just because I don't trust that a friendship can be maintained without any other senses besides a computer or cellphone screen.

Author: Saint Basil
Quote: A tree is known by its fruit; a man by his deeds. A good deed is never lost; he who sows courtesy reaps friendship, and he who plants kindness gathers love.

Author: Charles Lamb
Quote: Tis the privilege of friendship to talk nonsense, and have her nonsense respected.

Author: Salman Rushdie
Quote: I do have a lot of time for people in my life, and friendship is a very important subject for me. I think I'm unusual among the writers I know in that respect.

Author: Alexandra Chando
Quote: I have a couple of best friends, and I don't think I would live with them. It definitely... certain people can't live together, and I think that it could potentially put a lot of strain on the relationship or friendship.

Author: Donna Leon
Quote: I came to Venice for the first time in 1968 and was lucky enough to make the acquaintanceship, and then the friendship, of two Venetians, Roberta and Franco, who remain my best friends here after almost 50 years.

Author: Anais Nin
Quote: What I cannot love, I overlook. Is that real friendship?

Author: Charles Peguy
Quote: Love is rarer than genius itself. And friendship is rarer than love.

Author: Brooke Elliott
Quote: Friends confront each other sometimes, and sometimes the friendship lasts, and sometimes it doesn't.

Author: Thomas Jefferson
Quote: Friendship is but another name for an alliance with the follies and the misfortunes of others. Our own share of miseries is sufficient: why enter then as volunteers into those of another?

Author: Enrique Iglesias
Quote: My inspiration are the woman, friendship, and loneliness.

Author: Lysander Spooner
Quote: A traitor is a betrayer - one who practices injury, while professing friendship. Benedict Arnold was a traitor, solely because, while professing friendship for the American cause, he attempted to injure it. An open enemy, however criminal in other respects, is no traitor.

Author: Ann Landers
Quote: Love is friendship that has caught fire. It is quiet understanding, mutual confidence, sharing and forgiving. It is loyalty through good and bad times. It settles for less than perfection and makes allowances for human weaknesses.

Author: Jennifer Love Hewitt
Quote: I've always wanted to be a mom because I want to give a kid all of the magical gifts my mom gave to me, such as love and friendship. She and I had this incredible connection that was so unbelievable.

Author: Henri Nouwen
Quote: Friendship has always belonged to the core of my spiritual journey.

Author: Lisa See
Quote: People come in and out of our lives, and the true test of friendship is whether you can pick back up right where you left off the last time you saw each other.

Author: Anna Deavere Smith
Quote: Friendship is a wildly underrated medication.

Author: George Foreman
Quote: Forgiveness is that subtle thread that binds both love and friendship. Without forgiveness, you may not even have a child one day.

Author: Warren G. Harding
Quote: Only solitary men know the full joys of friendship. Others have their family; but to a solitary and an exile his friends are everything.

Author: Fiona Apple
Quote: Life is all about the friendship and the love and the music. It sounds silly, but it is. I want to have that experience as much as I can as an adult, not as a kid doing something that people are telling her she has to do. If anyone gets in my way, I'm going to get them out of my way.

Author: Amy Grant
Quote: Faith is salted and peppered through everything at Christmas. And I love at least one night by the Christmas tree to sing and feel the quiet holiness of that time that's set apart to celebrate love, friendship, and God's gift of the Christ child.

Author: Li Peng
Quote: At the beginning of the new century, it is the common aspiration of the peoples of the two countries to deepen mutual understanding, enhance trust, develop friendship and strengthen cooperation.

Author: Dirk Kempthorne
Quote: In my public service, I treasure my friendship with law enforcement officers. I admire what they do and support them in every aspect of their job. I have always looked upon law enforcement officers as my friends.

Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
Quote: Friendship, like the immortality of the soul, is too good to be believed.

Author: Sasha Grey
Quote: I sacrificed a lot, in terms of friendship and family, from working so much at such a young age, but I wouldn't be where I am if I hadn't.

Author: John Wooden
Quote: Be true to yourself, help others, make each day your masterpiece, make friendship a fine art, drink deeply from good books - especially the Bible, build a shelter against a rainy day, give thanks for your blessings and pray for guidance every day.

Author: Black Kettle
Quote: Although the troops have struck us, we throw it all behind and are glad to meet you in peace and friendship.

Author: Anita Brookner
Quote: Accountability in friendship is the equivalent of love without strategy.

Author: Kenneth Branagh
Quote: Friendship is one of the most tangible things in a world which offers fewer and fewer supports.

Author: Doris Kearns Goodwin
Quote: Taft was Roosevelt's handpicked successor. I didn't know how deep the friendship was between the two men until I read their almost four hundred letters, stretching back the to early '30s. It made me realize the heartbreak when they ruptured was much more than a political division.

Author: Dalai Lama
Quote: My aim is to create a happy society with genuine friendship. Friendship between Tibetan and Chinese peoples is very essential.

Author: William Hazlitt
Quote: Few things tend more to alienate friendship than a want of punctuality in our engagements. I have known the breach of a promise to dine or sup to break up more than one intimacy.

Author: Bruce Lee
Quote: Love is like a friendship caught on fire. In the beginning a flame, very pretty, often hot and fierce, but still only light and flickering. As love grows older, our hearts mature and our love becomes as coals, deep-burning and unquenchable.

Author: Vicente Fox
Quote: On one side, citizens have great respect for the United States; they have a great feeling of friendship. That is solid. But in the opposition and in the political arena I often find criticism of the closeness of relations with the United States. That is a reality.

Author: George Washington
Quote: Friendship is a plant of slow growth and must undergo and withstand the shocks of adversity before it is entitled to the appellation.

Author: Anna Freud
Quote: Why do we go around acting as though everything was friendship and reliability when basically everything everywhere is full of sudden hate and ugliness?

Author: August Strindberg
Quote: Friendship can only exist between persons with similar interests and points of view. Man and woman by the conventions of society are born with different interests and different points of view.

Author: Shimon Peres
Quote: Look, I worked with American Republican presidents and Democratic presidents, all of them, and each of them has shown a deep and profound friendship to Israel, you know? I can't remember anybody who was in that sense negative as far as Israel is concerned.

Author: Anne Lamott
Quote: Your experiences will be yours alone. But truth and best friendship will rarely if ever disappoint you.

Author: Vincent Nichols
Quote: Among young people, often a key factor in them committing suicide is the trauma of transient relationships. They throw themselves into a friendship or network of friendships, then it collapses and they're desolate.

Author: Lord Byron
Quote: Friendship is Love without his wings!

Author: Samuel Johnson
Quote: Friendship, like love, is destroyed by long absence, though it may be increased by short intermissions.

Author: Jane Austen
Quote: General benevolence, but not general friendship, made a man what he ought to be.

Author: Amy Grant
Quote: Faith is salted and peppered through everything at Christmas. And I love at least one night by the Christmas tree to sing and feel the quiet holiness of that time that's set apart to celebrate love, friendship, and God's gift of the Christ child.

Author: Susan Glaspell
Quote: As I grow older, I think friendship between women is a thing to cherish.

Author: Jessye Norman
Quote: I am deeply spiritual; I revel in those things that make for good - the things that we can do to shed a little light, to help place an oft-dissonant universe back in tune with itself... Long live art, long live friendship, long live the joy of life!

Author: Madeleine Albright
Quote: No matter what message you are about to deliver somewhere, whether it is holding out a hand of friendship, or making clear that you disapprove of something, is the fact that the person sitting across the table is a human being, so the goal is to always establish common ground.

Author: Mahmoud Ahmadinejad
Quote: Those who insist on having hostilities with us, kill and destroy the option of friendship with us in the future, which is unfortunate because it is clear the future belongs to Iran and that enmities will be fruitless.

Author: Alban Berg
Quote: I can tell you, dearest friend, that if it became known how much friendship, love and a world of human and spiritual references I have smuggled into these three movements, the adherents of programme music - should there be any left - would go mad with joy.

Author: Robert Louis Stevenson
Quote: Marriage: A friendship recognized by the police.

Author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld
Quote: In friendship as well as love, ignorance very often contributes more to our happiness than knowledge.

Author: E. W. Howe
Quote: It may be a cold, clammy thing to say, but those that treat friendship the same as any other selfishness seem to get the most out of it.

Author: Sallust
Quote: To like and dislike the same things, this is what makes a solid friendship.

Author: Neale Donald Walsch
Quote: I'm calling my book series the 'with God series.' And this next 'with God' book is Friendship with God, which comes out in November. This books challenges us to bring about the end of 'better' on this planet.

Author: Jasmine Guy
Quote: The building of friendship, family, community and love is complicated. We are so isolated in this country, no longer supported by tribes and villages.

Author: Hill Harper
Quote: Men and women can absolutely be friends, and that's what we need to be. Part of the problem is that we aren't friends enough. Our relationships are negotiations, and that is not friendship.

Author: Marcelene Cox
Quote: One sure way to lose another woman's friendship is to try to improve her flower arrangements.

Author: Lucan
Quote: Nobody ever chooses the already unfortunate as objects of his loyal friendship.

Author: Amity Shlaes
Quote: Anything can be done if you find friends to do it with. The lucky biographers find themselves drawn into a sort of friendship with their subject.

Author: Rochelle Aytes
Quote: 'Mistresses' is about the lives of four women, each going through different versions of infidelity. Their longtime friendship is what gets them through extremely challenging times.

Author: Quentin Bryce
Quote: I didn't have any Indigenous friends until I was in my 30s, and I'll always remember and be inspired by the remarkable friendship I had with Connie Bush, an outstanding Indigenous leader from Groot Eylandt on who was on the National Women's Advisory Council with me.

Author: Jane Harrison
Quote: Marriage, for a woman at least, hampers the two things that made life to me glorious - friendship and learning.

Author: Fawn M. Brodie
Quote: A passion for politics stems usually from an insatiable need, either for power, or for friendship and adulation, or a combination of both.

Author: Jennifer Aniston
Quote: I think it's important to have closure in any relationship that ends - from a romantic relationship to a friendship. You should always have a sense of clarity at the end and know why it began and why it ended. You need that in your life to move cleanly into your next phase.

Author: Emil Zatopek
Quote: Great is the victory, but the friendship of all is greater.

Author: Elizabeth Bibesco
Quote: Friendship is a difficult, dangerous job. It is also (though we rarely admit it) extremely exhausting.

Author: Hu Jintao
Quote: China has been committed to the independent foreign policy of peace and has developed friendship and cooperation with all countries on the basis of the Five Principles of Peaceful Coexistence.

Author: Luanne Rice
Quote: 'Safe Harbor' is a state of mind... it's the place - in reality or metaphor - to which one goes in times of trouble or worry. It can be a friendship, marriage, church, garden, beach, poem, prayer, or song.

Author: George Santayana
Quote: Friendship is almost always the union of a part of one mind with the part of another; people are friends in spots.

Author: Paul Theroux
Quote: Friendship is also about liking a person for their failings, their weakness. It's also about mutual help, not about exploitation.

Author: Henry Ward Beecher
Quote: Laughter is not a bad beginning for a friendship, and it is the best ending for one.

Author: William Glasser
Quote: Caring for but never trying to own may be a further way to define friendship.

Author: Jean de la Bruyere
Quote: Time makes friendship stronger, but love weaker.

Author: Dean Smith
Quote: As soon as you try to describe a close friendship, it loses something.

Author: Robin Morgan
Quote: Friendship is mutual blackmail elevated to the level of love.

Author: Sting
Quote: Success always necessitates a degree of ruthlessness. Given the choice of friendship or success, I'd probably choose success.

Author: Jean Cocteau
Quote: I have lost my seven best friends, which is to say God has had mercy on me seven times without realizing it. He lent a friendship, took it from me, sent me another.

Author: Sophie Swetchine
Quote: The ideal friendship is to feel as one while remaining two.

Author: Rowan Williams
Quote: Friendship is something that creates equality and mutuality, not a reward for finding equality or a way of intensifying existing mutuality.

Author: Eric Heiden
Quote: I have a very close friendship with the skaters.

Author: Richard Lugar
Quote: I would like to raise my glass to friendship between Russia and the United States.

Author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.
Quote: Sweet is the scene where genial friendship plays the pleasing game of interchanging praise.

Author: Wole Soyinka
Quote: I take friendship very seriously.

Author: Jane Campion
Quote: I didn't like England. I couldn't take the look of the place or the style of friendship. I need more intimacy from people than is considered okay there, and I felt that my personality and my enthusiasms weren't understood. I had to put a big lid on myself.

Author: Socrates
Quote: Be slow to fall into friendship; but when thou art in, continue firm and constant.

Author: Li Keqiang
Quote: China-Africa relationship has a long history and is full of vitality. Since the 1950s and 1960s, our common historical experiences have brought China and Africa together, and we have forged deep friendship in our joint struggle during which we have supported each other in times of difficulty.

Author: James F. Byrnes
Quote: It will give them the opportunity to show themselves worthy of the respect and friendship of peace-loving nations, and in time, to take an honorable place among members of the United Nations.

Author: Dolly Wells
Quote: I love 'Curb Your Enthusiasm' and 'Extras' and also 'The Trip.' That had all the nuances of friendship and finding things out about their lives without it being too much plot-driven.

Author: Eugene Kennedy
Quote: Friendship is something whose depth fits human aspirations and fulfills human possibilities. It has heft to it, as a gold-piece does and a gambling chip does not.

Author: Deborah Sampson
Quote: November 11, 1802, I arrived at Judge Patterson's at Lisle. This respectable family treated me with every mark of distinction and friendship, and likewise all the people did the same. I really want for words to express my gratitude.

Author: Laura Leighton
Quote: I think 'Pretty Little Liars' is going to be hugely popular for adults, for kids, for girls, for guys, you know, something for everyone to look at, and the stories are going to be great. There's suspense every week. The friendship is really fun to watch. I think it's going to have something for everybody.

Author: Arnold H. Glasow
Quote: A true friend never gets in your way unless you happen to be going down.

Author: Doug Larson
Quote: A true friend is one who overlooks your failures and tolerates your success!

Author: Robert Louis Stevenson
Quote: A friend is a gift you give yourself.

Author: Anais Nin
Quote: Each friend represents a world in us, a world not born until they arrive, and it is only by this meeting that a new world is born.

Author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin
Quote: The world is round so that friendship may encircle it.

Author: Henry David Thoreau
Quote: True friendship can afford true knowledge. It does not depend on darkness and ignorance.

Author: Richard Burton
Quote: False friendship, like the ivy, decays and ruins the walls it embraces; but true friendship gives new life and animation to the object it supports.

Author: John D. Rockefeller
Quote: A friendship founded on business is better than a business founded on friendship.

Author: Francesco Guicciardini
Quote: Since there is nothing so well worth having as friends, never lose a chance to make them.

Author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.
Quote: There is no friend like an old friend who has shared our morning days, no greeting like his welcome, no homage like his praise.

Author: Virginia Woolf
Quote: Some people go to priests; others to poetry; I to my friends.

Author: Robert Staughton Lynd
Quote: Friendship will not stand the strain of very much good advice for very long.

Author: C. S. Lewis
Quote: Friendship is unnecessary, like philosophy, like art... It has no survival value; rather it is one of those things that give value to survival.

Author: Abraham Lincoln
Quote: Do I not destroy my enemies when I make them my friends?

Author: Plautus
Quote: Nothing but heaven itself is better than a friend who is really a friend.

Author: E. W. Howe
Quote: Instead of loving your enemies - treat your friends a little better.

Author: Jennifer Aniston
Quote: Where would you be without friends? The people to pick you up when you need lifting? We come from homes far from perfect, so you end up almost parent and sibling to your friends - your own chosen family. There's nothing like a really loyal, dependable, good friend. Nothing.

Author: Judy Holliday
Quote: Lovers have a right to betray you... friends don't.

Author: Nathaniel Hawthorne
Quote: Our most intimate friend is not he to whom we show the worst, but the best of our nature.

Author: Robert E. Lee
Quote: Never do a wrong thing to make a friend or to keep one.

Author: Sophocles
Quote: You win the victory when you yield to friends.

Author: Baltasar Gracian
Quote: Never have a companion that casts you in the shade.

Author: Benjamin Franklin
Quote: Be slow in choosing a friend, slower in changing.

Author: Samuel Pepys
Quote: Mighty proud I am that I am able to have a spare bed for my friends.

Author: Shirley MacLaine
Quote: Fear makes strangers of people who would be friends.

Author: Friedrich Nietzsche
Quote: Rejoicing in our joy, not suffering over our suffering, makes someone a friend.

Author: Larry Flynt
Quote: The two most misused words in the entire English vocabulary are love and friendship. A true friend would die for you, so when you start trying to count them on one hand, you don't need any fingers.

Author: Emil Ludwig
Quote: Many a person has held close, throughout their entire lives, two friends that always remained strange to one another, because one of them attracted by virtue of similarity, the other by difference.

Author: Truman Capote
Quote: Friendship is a pretty full-time occupation if you really are friendly with somebody. You can't have too many friends because then you're just not really friends.

Author: Charles Caleb Colton
Quote: Friendship, of itself a holy tie, is made more sacred by adversity.

Author: Mariella Frostrup
Quote: Every friendship goes through ups and downs. Dysfunctional patterns set in; external situations cause internal friction; you grow apart and then bounce back together.

Author: Stanley Hauerwas
Quote: To be poor does not mean you lack the means to extend charity to another. You may lack money or food, but you have the gift of friendship to overwhelm the loneliness that grips the lives of so many.

Author: Oliver Goldsmith
Quote: Friendship is a disinterested commerce between equals; love, an abject intercourse between tyrants and slaves.

Author: Lucy Larcom
Quote: A friend is a beloved mystery; dearest always because he is not ourself, and has something in him which it is impossible for us to fathom. If it were not so, friendship would lose its chief zest.

Author: Dalai Lama
Quote: Even an animal, if you show genuine affection, gradually trust develops... If you always showing bad face and beating, how can you develop friendship?

Author: Voltaire
Quote: Friendship is the marriage of the soul, and this marriage is liable to divorce.

Author: Joseph Addison
Quote: The greatest sweetener of human life is Friendship. To raise this to the highest pitch of enjoyment, is a secret which but few discover.

Author: John O'Donohue
Quote: Most people are enduring a marginalized isolation. One of the great obstacles to modern friendships is the 'religion of rush.' People are rushing all the time through time. Friendship takes time.

Author: Jeff Ross
Quote: People are roasting each other at parties, at work events, around the fire. It's so fun. People are busting each other's chops, and it's a sign of affection, truly. It's a true test of love and friendship: can you make a man laugh at himself? So what makes a good burn? Go after targets you love and respect. And hit 'em hard.

Author: John Frusciante
Quote: For me my friendship with Omar Rodriguez from Mars Volta that friendship really means a lot to me because he's another creative person who works as hard as I do.

Author: Henry Ward Beecher
Quote: It is one of the severest tests of friendship to tell your friend his faults. So to love a man that you cannot bear to see a stain upon him, and to speak painful truth through loving words, that is friendship.

Author: Jeremy Taylor
Quote: Love is friendship set on fire.

Author: Alice Walker
Quote: I made my first white women friends in college; they loved me and were loyal to our friendship, but I understood, as they did, that they were white women and that whiteness mattered.

Author: Theophile Gautier
Quote: It is difficult to obtain the friendship of a cat. It is a philosophical animal... one that does not place its affections thoughtlessly.

Author: Arthur Ashe
Quote: We must reach out our hand in friendship and dignity both to those who would befriend us and those who would be our enemy.

Author: Marcus Tullius Cicero
Quote: The rule of friendship means there should be mutual sympathy between them, each supplying what the other lacks and trying to benefit the other, always using friendly and sincere words.

Author: Jean de la Bruyere
Quote: Love and friendship exclude each other.

Author: Edgar Allan Poe
Quote: There is something in the unselfish and self-sacrificing love of a brute, which goes directly to the heart of him who has had frequent occasion to test the paltry friendship and gossamer fidelity of mere Man.

Author: Marlo Thomas
Quote: When I was growing up, my mother was always a friend to my siblings and me (in addition to being all the other things a mom is), and I was always grateful for that because I knew she was someone I could talk to and joke with, and argue with and that nothing would ever harm that friendship.

Author: Jeremy Taylor
Quote: Secrecy is the chastity of friendship.

Author: Simon Sinek
Quote: A friend is an emotional bond, just like friendship is a human experience.

Author: Paul Simon
Quote: I would be willing to do almost anything to make Art happy. I care about our friendship. The only thing I won't do is change the essence of my work.

Author: Elizabeth Berkley
Quote: I noticed that no matter where I went in the country, there was this group of questions that got asked. I would track them and keep them in categories. Like body image, school, family, friendship, you name it, the emotional life of a teenage girl.

Author: Suzanne Brockmann
Quote: I love the fact that so many of my readers are intelligent, exceptional, accomplished people with an open-minded love of diversity. But even more than that, I love it when my readers find lasting friendship with others of my readers - knowing that they met through their mutual affection for my books and characters makes me happy!

Author: Stendhal
Quote: Friendship has its illusions no less than love.

Author: Zhang Ziyi
Quote: When two people first meet, they can only have a very ordinary kind of friendship. But when you begin to understand each other, when you get close to them, you discover that you're suddenly eager to know him or her even better.

Author: Gilbert Parker
Quote: It must be remembered that the sea is a great breeder of friendship. Two men who have known each other for twenty years find that twenty days at sea bring them nearer than ever they were before, or else estrange them.

Author: Baltasar Gracian
Quote: True friendship multiplies the good in life and divides its evils. Strive to have friends, for life without friends is like life on a desert island... to find one real friend in a lifetime is good fortune; to keep him is a blessing.

Author: George Herbert
Quote: Read as you taste fruit or savor wine, or enjoy friendship, love or life.

Author: Plautus
Quote: Friendship is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.

Author: J. Paul Getty
Quote: During the 1950s, Aristotle Onassis and I formed what grew to be a close friendship and association in several business ventures.

Author: Marion Cotillard
Quote: I think in friendship, you want to be there for your friend, and sometimes you just don't know what to do or the relationship you have with them is not clear enough for you to know what to do.

Author: E. W. Howe
Quote: The little trouble in the world that is not due to love is due to friendship.

Author: Thomas Moore
Quote: Came but for friendship, and took away love.

Author: Sallust
Quote: The firmest friendship is based on an identity of likes and dislikes.

Author: Alanis Morissette
Quote: I'm quite obsessed with the idea of nailing the girl friendship. It's such an art, so delicate.

Author: Tim Tebow
Quote: I want to use my connections with coaches, players, celebrities, whomever, and if I can take that friendship and use it to help someone else, I'm going to take advantage of that. I'm not going to apologize for that.

Author: Ram Dass
Quote: We come into relationships often very much identified with our needs. I need this, I need security, I need refuge, I need friendship. And all of relationships are symbiotic in that sense. We come together because we fulfill each others' needs at some level or other.

Author: Mortimer Adler
Quote: Aristotle uses a mother's love for her child as the prime example of love or friendship.

Author: Joe Biden
Quote: You've got to reach a hand of friendship across the aisle and across philosophies in this country.

Author: Christopher Knight
Quote: To some it may be a thrill to be known, to me it's a thrill to start a friendship even up.

Author: Jill Scott
Quote: I've learned that friendship does not equate business, business does not equate friendship.

Author: Ashton Kutcher
Quote: I really think that technology has the greatest potential to accelerate happiness of most things in the world. The companies that will ultimately do well are the companies that chase happiness. If you find a way to help people find love, or health or friendship, the dollar will chase that.

Author: Sallust
Quote: All who consult on doubtful matters, should be void of hatred, friendship, anger, and pity.

Author: Martin Freeman
Quote: Like any friendship or marriage, familiarity breeds more contempt, and love, and everything.

Author: Clifton Fadiman
Quote: One measure of friendship consists not in the number of things friends can discuss, but in the number of things they need no longer mention.

Author: Paloma Faith
Quote: I lend people money, but I'd never lend something that would jeopardise a friendship if I didn't get it back.

Author: Carine Roitfeld
Quote: I mix talents and friendship, which is not very professional, but it's my way of thinking. So I love Azzedine Alaia, because I've known him for 30 years, and he's making my dresses most of the time.

Author: Francis Marion Crawford
Quote: No one person can possibly combine all the elements supposed to make up what everyone means by friendship.

Author: Henry David Thoreau
Quote: A man cannot be said to succeed in this life who does not satisfy one friend.

Author: Epicurus
Quote: It is not so much our friends' help that helps us, as the confidence of their help.

Author: Aristotle
Quote: He who hath many friends hath none.

Author: Hubert H. Humphrey
Quote: The greatest healing therapy is friendship and love.

Author: Bruce Lee
Quote: Love is like a friendship caught on fire. In the beginning a flame, very pretty, often hot and fierce, but still only light and flickering. As love grows older, our hearts mature and our love becomes as coals, deep-burning and unquenchable.

Author: Ann Landers
Quote: Love is friendship that has caught fire. It is quiet understanding, mutual confidence, sharing and forgiving. It is loyalty through good and bad times. It settles for less than perfection and makes allowances for human weaknesses.

Author: Bruce Lee
Quote: Love is like a friendship caught on fire. In the beginning a flame, very pretty, often hot and fierce, but still only light and flickering. As love grows older, our hearts mature and our love becomes as coals, deep-burning and unquenchable.

Author: Orson Welles
Quote: We're born alone, we live alone, we die alone. Only through our love and friendship can we create the illusion for the moment that we're not alone.

Author: John Wooden
Quote: Be true to yourself, help others, make each day your masterpiece, make friendship a fine art, drink deeply from good books - especially the Bible, build a shelter against a rainy day, give thanks for your blessings and pray for guidance every day.

Author: Larry Flynt
Quote: The two most misused words in the entire English vocabulary are love and friendship. A true friend would die for you, so when you start trying to count them on one hand, you don't need any fingers.

Author: Jean de La Fontaine
Quote: Friendship is the shadow of the evening, which increases with the setting sun of life.

Author: Marilyn Monroe
Quote: Experts on romance say for a happy marriage there has to be more than a passionate love. For a lasting union, they insist, there must be a genuine liking for each other. Which, in my book, is a good definition for friendship.

Author: Friedrich Nietzsche
Quote: It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages.

Author: Saint Basil
Quote: A tree is known by its fruit; a man by his deeds. A good deed is never lost; he who sows courtesy reaps friendship, and he who plants kindness gathers love.

Author: Jennifer Aniston
Quote: I think it's important to have closure in any relationship that ends - from a romantic relationship to a friendship. You should always have a sense of clarity at the end and know why it began and why it ended. You need that in your life to move cleanly into your next phase.

Author: Friedrich Nietzsche
Quote: A woman may very well form a friendship with a man, but for this to endure, it must be assisted by a little physical antipathy.

Author: Marcus Tullius Cicero
Quote: What sweetness is left in life, if you take away friendship? Robbing life of friendship is like robbing the world of the sun. A true friend is more to be esteemed than kinsfolk.

Author: Oscar Wilde
Quote: Between men and women there is no friendship possible. There is passion, enmity, worship, love, but no friendship.

Author: Eustace Budgell
Quote: Friendship is a strong and habitual inclination in two persons to promote the good and happiness of one another.

Author: Albert Camus
Quote: How can sincerity be a condition of friendship? A taste for truth at any cost is a passion which spares nothing.

Author: Eleanor Roosevelt
Quote: Friendship with ones self is all important, because without it one cannot be friends with anyone else in the world.

Author: John Wooden
Quote: Be true to yourself. Make each day a masterpiece. Help others. Drink deeply from good books. Make friendship a fine art. Build a shelter against a rainy day.

Author: Adam Clayton
Quote: From an early age I didn't buy into the value systems of working hard in a nine-to-five job. I thought creativity, friendship and loyalty and pushing the boundaries of what was acceptable was much more interesting.

Author: Oscar Wilde
Quote: Between men and women there is no friendship possible. There is passion, enmity, worship, love, but no friendship.

Author: Joseph Addison
Quote: True happiness arises, in the first place, from the enjoyment of one's self, and in the next, from the friendship and conversation of a few select companions.

Author: George Washington
Quote: True friendship is a plant of slow growth, and must undergo and withstand the shocks of adversity, before it is entitled to the appellation.

Author: Charles R. Swindoll
Quote: It's the most exciting thing to watch God work when I've asked him about something, to listen to him and watch him work. It's like this friendship, and it just grows and grows and grows and grows.

Author: Eleanor Robson Belmont
Quote: Never be afraid to meet to the hilt the demand of either work, or friendship - two of life's major assets.

Author: Marcus Tullius Cicero
Quote: Friendship improves happiness and abates misery, by the doubling of our joy and the dividing of our grief.

Author: Ulysses S. Grant
Quote: The friend in my adversity I shall always cherish most. I can better trust those who helped to relieve the gloom of my dark hours than those who are so ready to enjoy with me the sunshine of my prosperity.

Author: Francis Quarles
Quote: That friendship will not continue to the end which is begun for an end.

Author: Plutarch
Quote: I don't need a friend who changes when I change and who nods when I nod; my shadow does that much better.

Author: Giotto di Bondone
Quote: The sincere friends of this world are as ship lights in the stormiest of nights.

Author: Washington Irving
Quote: Sweet is the memory of distant friends! Like the mellow rays of the departing sun, it falls tenderly, yet sadly, on the heart.

Author: Oscar Wilde
Quote: True friends stab you in the front.

Author: George Foreman
Quote: Forgiveness is that subtle thread that binds both love and friendship. Without forgiveness, you may not even have a child one day.

Author: Pam Brown
Quote: A friendship can weather most things and thrive in thin soil; but it needs a little mulch of letters and phone calls and small, silly presents every so often - just to save it from drying out completely.

Author: Herodotus
Quote: Of all possessions a friend is the most precious.

Author: Charles Caleb Colton
Quote: True friendship is like sound health; the value of it is seldom known until it is lost.

Author: Charles Darwin
Quote: A man's friendships are one of the best measures of his worth.

Author: Eugene Kennedy
Quote: The real test of friendship is: can you literally do nothing with the other person? Can you enjoy those moments of life that are utterly simple?

Author: Emily Dickinson
Quote: My friends are my estate.

Author: Marcus Tullius Cicero
Quote: A friend is, as it were, a second self.

Author: Henry Adams
Quote: A friend in power is a friend lost.

Author: Joseph Brodsky
Quote: How delightful to find a friend in everyone.

Author: Oscar Wilde
Quote: He has no enemies, but is intensely disliked by his friends.

Author: George Santayana
Quote: One's friends are that part of the human race with which one can be human.

Author: George Washington
Quote: Be courteous to all, but intimate with few, and let those few be well tried before you give them your confidence.

Author: Fiona Apple
Quote: Life is all about the friendship and the love and the music. It sounds silly, but it is. I want to have that experience as much as I can as an adult, not as a kid doing something that people are telling her she has to do. If anyone gets in my way, I'm going to get them out of my way.

Author: Simone Weil
Quote: To want friendship is a great fault. Friendship ought to be a gratuitous joy, like the joys afforded by art or life.

Author: Alice Miller
Quote: If it's very painful for you to criticize your friends - you're safe in doing it. But if you take the slightest pleasure in it, that's the time to hold your tongue.

Author: Ethel Barrymore
Quote: The best time to make friends is before you need them.

Author: Laurence J. Peter
Quote: You can always tell a real friend: when you've made a fool of yourself he doesn't feel you've done a permanent job.

Author: George Jean Nathan
Quote: Love demands infinitely less than friendship.

Author: Khalil Gibran
Quote: Let there be no purpose in friendship save the deepening of the spirit.

Author: Mario Puzo
Quote: Friendship and money: oil and water.

Author: Robert Hall
Quote: A friend should be one in whose understanding and virtue we can equally confide, and whose opinion we can value at once for its justness and its sincerity.

Author: Eddie Murray
Quote: When Ted Williams was here, inducted into the Hall of Fame 37 years ago, he said he must have earned it, because he didn't win it because of his friendship with the writers. I guess in that way, I'm proud to be in this company that way.

Author: Eamon de Valera
Quote: The part which American friendship played in helping us to win the freedom we enjoy in this part of Ireland has been gratefully recognized and acknowledged by our people.

Author: Richard Attias
Quote: Sport is one of the few spaces where people can learn about different cultures in a spirit of trust and friendship.

Author: Sebastian Faulks
Quote: I think closeness to death would be pretty exhilarating in a way, and friendship, yeh, and selflessness, a kind of selflessness, a sense of your own worthlessness, I think, is pretty exhilarating.

Author: Rob Reiner
Quote: When I read 'Stand By Me,' it was like, 'This is a look back at the same time period when I was growing up, and it was about kids, but it really felt like what it was like to have those powerful feelings of friendship at age 12.' That's what got to me.

Author: Bradley Chicho
Quote: The friendship we share grows amidst the craggy rock pond; reeds of water spray fireflies scented with bonfires.

Author: Kenny Marchant
Quote: I am proud to represent these men and women who empower people in developing nations and promote the Peace Corps mission of peace and friendship. These volunteers are making major strides to improve the lives of people and communities around the world.

Author: Jennifer Chiaverini
Quote: Mary Lincoln provided Elizabeth Keckley with opportunities for social and economic advancement she probably had never imagined during her years as a slave, while Elizabeth offered Mary the loyal, steadfast friendship she craved but had always found so elusive.

Author: Armistead Maupin
Quote: The film itself involves a New York City radio storyteller, Gabriel Noone, who strikes up a friendship with one of his fans, an abused 14-year-old teenager who is suffering from AIDS, who does not have much longer to live.

Author: John Woo
Quote: My films are always concerned with family, friendship, honor, and patriotism.

Author: Tony Garza
Quote: In the name of the United States and President Bush, I want to thank the Mexican people, President Fox and his government for their friendship.

Author: Hank Haney
Quote: I know I was a great friend to Tiger Woods. But when you have a relationship that's involves business and friendship - and the business part comes to an end - things always get a little blurry.

Author: Aleksander Kwasniewski
Quote: And we want to develop our strategy to partnership and friendship with the United States, which is connected with a very rich history but what is very important for our future.

Author: Mencius
Quote: Friendship with a man is friendship with his virtue.

Author: Lennon Parham
Quote: From the Twitter responses we got with 'Best Friends Forever' and the small feedback we are getting as the show is meted out, I think people are seeing themselves in the show and enjoying seeing female friendship portrayed in the way it really is.

Author: Jane Green
Quote: Going through an illness and then death of a close friend has changed my attitudes to friendship enormously.

Author: Jeff Lemire
Quote: To me, Green Arrow in the past, what people loved about Oliver Queen pre-New 52 was his relationships with other heroes. Like his friendship with Green Lantern, his animosity with Hawkman, his romance with Black Canary - these are all the things that sort of defined him.

Author: Emma McLaughlin
Quote: My writing partner, Nicki, and I became obsessed with a monologist who performs unscripted shows equipped with nothing more than scribbled bullet points and a glass of water. We wrote him a fan letter and found ourselves sharing lunch and eventually a friendship.

Author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox
Quote: All love that has not friendship for its base, is like a mansion built upon the sand.

Author: Mortimer Adler
Quote: Friendship is a very taxing and arduous form of leisure activity.

Author: Robert Blair
Quote: Friendship! Mysterious cement of the soul, Sweet'ner of life, and solder of society.

Author: Alain de Botton
Quote: The arrogance that says analysing the relationship between reasons and causes is more important than writing a philosophy of shyness or sadness or friendship drives me nuts. I can't accept that.

Author: Oliver Goldsmith
Quote: Pity and friendship are two passions incompatible with each other.

Author: William Wycherley
Quote: Good fellowship and friendship are lasting, rational and manly pleasures.

Author: Thomas Jefferson
Quote: Peace, commerce and honest friendship with all nations; entangling alliances with none.

Author: H. L. Mencken
Quote: One of the most mawkish of human delusions is the notion that friendship should be eternal, or, at all events, life-long, and that any act which puts a term to it is somehow discreditable.

Author: Aristotle
Quote: My best friend is the man who in wishing me well wishes it for my sake.

Author: Jean de La Fontaine
Quote: Rare as is true love, true friendship is rarer.

Author: Bill Watterson
Quote: Things are never quite as scary when you've got a best friend.

Author: Henry Adams
Quote: Friends are born, not made.

Author: Len Wein
Quote: A true friend is someone who is there for you when he'd rather be anywhere else.

Author: Elbert Hubbard
Quote: A friend is one who knows you and loves you just the same.

Author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld
Quote: A true friend is the greatest of all blessings, and that which we take the least care of all to acquire.

Author: Paramahansa Yogananda
Quote: There is a magnet in your heart that will attract true friends. That magnet is unselfishness, thinking of others first; when you learn to live for others, they will live for you.

Author: Albert Schweitzer
Quote: In everyone's life, at some time, our inner fire goes out. It is then burst into flame by an encounter with another human being. We should all be thankful for those people who rekindle the inner spirit.

Author: Baltasar Gracian
Quote: True friendship multiplies the good in life and divides its evils. Strive to have friends, for life without friends is like life on a desert island... to find one real friend in a lifetime is good fortune; to keep him is a blessing.

Author: Jim Morrison
Quote: A friend is someone who gives you total freedom to be yourself.

Author: Doug Larson
Quote: A true friend is one who overlooks your failures and tolerates your success!

Author: Jean de la Bruyere
Quote: Two persons cannot long be friends if they cannot forgive each other's little failings.

Author: Mencius
Quote: Friendship is one mind in two bodies.

Author: Henri Nouwen
Quote: When we honestly ask ourselves which person in our lives means the most to us, we often find that it is those who, instead of giving advice, solutions, or cures, have chosen rather to share our pain and touch our wounds with a warm and tender hand.

Author: Henry David Thoreau
Quote: The most I can do for my friend is simply be his friend.

Author: Aristotle
Quote: A friend to all is a friend to none.

Author: Margaret Walker
Quote: Friends and good manners will carry you where money won't go.

Author: Jean de La Fontaine
Quote: Rare as is true love, true friendship is rarer.

Author: Henry David Thoreau
Quote: The language of friendship is not words but meanings.

Author: Oprah Winfrey
Quote: Lots of people want to ride with you in the limo, but what you want is someone who will take the bus with you when the limo breaks down.

Author: Henri Nouwen
Quote: The friend who can be silent with us in a moment of despair or confusion, who can stay with us in an hour of grief and bereavement, who can tolerate not knowing... not healing, not curing... that is a friend who cares.

Author: Justin Bieber
Quote: Friends are the best to turn to when you're having a rough day.

Author: Elie Wiesel
Quote: Friendship marks a life even more deeply than love. Love risks degenerating into obsession, friendship is never anything but sharing.

Author: Khalil Gibran
Quote: Your friend is your needs answered.

Author: Joseph Roux
Quote: We call that person who has lost his father, an orphan; and a widower that man who has lost his wife. But that man who has known the immense unhappiness of losing a friend, by what name do we call him? Here every language is silent and holds its peace in impotence.

Author: Thomas Aquinas
Quote: Friendship is the source of the greatest pleasures, and without friends even the most agreeable pursuits become tedious.

Author: Oscar Wilde
Quote: Laughter is not at all a bad beginning for a friendship, and it is far the best ending for one.

Author: Aristotle
Quote: Wishing to be friends is quick work, but friendship is a slow ripening fruit.

Author: Unknown
Quote: An insincere and evil friend is more to be feared than a wild beast; a wild beast may wound your body, but an evil friend will wound your mind.

Author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.
Quote: But friendship is the breathing rose, with sweets in every fold.

Author: Sarah Orne Jewett
Quote: Yes'm, old friends is always best, 'less you can catch a new one that's fit to make an old one out of.

Author: Socrates
Quote: Be slow to fall into friendship; but when thou art in, continue firm and constant.

Author: Henry David Thoreau
Quote: Friends... they cherish one another's hopes. They are kind to one another's dreams.

Author: Thomas A. Edison
Quote: I have friends in overalls whose friendship I would not swap for the favor of the kings of the world.

Author: John Webster
Quote: Lay this unto your breast: Old friends, like old swords, still are trusted best.

Author: Charles Kingsley
Quote: It is only the great hearted who can be true friends. The mean and cowardly, Can never know what true friendship means.

Author: Confucius
Quote: It is more shameful to distrust our friends than to be deceived by them.

Author: Chanakya
Quote: Never make friends with people who are above or below you in status. Such friendships will never give you any happiness.

Author: Oscar Wilde
Quote: An excellent man; he has no enemies; and none of his friends like him.

Author: Confucius
Quote: Never contract friendship with a man that is not better than thyself.

Author: Chanakya
Quote: There is some self-interest behind every friendship. There is no friendship without self-interests. This is a bitter truth.

Author: Amos Bronson Alcott
Quote: Our friends interpret the world and ourselves to us, if we take them tenderly and truly.

Author: Baltasar Gracian
Quote: Friendship multiplies the good of life and divides the evil.

Author: Toni Morrison
Quote: She is a friend of mind. She gather me, man. The pieces I am, she gather them and give them back to me in all the right order. It's good, you know, when you got a woman who is a friend of your mind.

Author: Margaret Lee Runbeck
Quote: Silences make the real conversations between friends. Not the saying but the never needing to say is what counts.

Author: Jane Austen
Quote: Friendship is certainly the finest balm for the pangs of disappointed love.

Author: John Leonard
Quote: It takes a long time to grow an old friend.

Author: Barack Obama
Quote: To avoid being mistaken for a sellout, I chose my friends carefully. The more politically active black students. The foreign students. The Chicanos. The Marxist professors and structural feminists and punk-rock performance poets.

Author: Jodie Foster
Quote: My definition of a friend is somebody who adores you even though they know the things you're most ashamed of.

Author: Charles Eastman
Quote: Friendship is held to be the severest test of character. It is easy, we think, to be loyal to a family and clan, whose blood is in your own veins.

Author: Marlene Dietrich
Quote: It's the friends you can call up at 4 a.m. that matter.

Author: Saint Francis de Sales
Quote: A quarrel between friends, when made up, adds a new tie to friendship.

Author: Hubert H. Humphrey
Quote: The greatest gift of life is friendship, and I have received it.

Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca
Quote: One of the most beautiful qualities of true friendship is to understand and to be understood.

Author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.
Quote: Remember that the most valuable antiques are dear old friends.

Author: Helen Keller
Quote: Walking with a friend in the dark is better than walking alone in the light.

Author: Walter Winchell
Quote: A real friend is one who walks in when the rest of the world walks out.

Author: Charles R. Swindoll
Quote: I cannot even imagine where I would be today were it not for that handful of friends who have given me a heart full of joy. Let's face it, friends make life a lot more fun.

Author: Thomas Aquinas
Quote: There is nothing on this earth more to be prized than true friendship.

Author: Mencius
Quote: Friends are the siblings God never gave us.

Author: Martin Luther King, Jr.
Quote: Love is the only force capable of transforming an enemy into friend.

Author: Muhammad Ali
Quote: Friendship... is not something you learn in school. But if you haven't learned the meaning of friendship, you really haven't learned anything.

Author: Khalil Gibran
Quote: Friendship is always a sweet responsibility, never an opportunity.

Author: Henry Van Dyke
Quote: A friend is what the heart needs all the time.

Author: Albert Camus
Quote: Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend.

Author: Leo Buscaglia
Quote: A single rose can be my garden... a single friend, my world.

Author: Euripides
Quote: One loyal friend is worth ten thousand relatives.

Author: Euripides
Quote: Friends show their love in times of trouble, not in happiness.

Author: Octavia Butler
Quote: Sometimes being a friend means mastering the art of timing. There is a time for silence. A time to let go and allow people to hurl themselves into their own destiny. And a time to prepare to pick up the pieces when it's all over.

Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
Quote: It is one of the blessings of old friends that you can afford to be stupid with them.

Author: William Penn
Quote: A true friend freely, advises justly, assists readily, adventures boldly, takes all patiently, defends courageously, and continues a friend unchangeably.

Author: Marcus Tullius Cicero
Quote: Love is the attempt to form a friendship inspired by beauty.

Author: Henry Ford
Quote: My best friend is the one who brings out the best in me.

Author: Marcel Proust
Quote: Let us be grateful to people who make us happy, they are the charming gardeners who make our souls blossom.

Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
Quote: The only way to have a friend is to be one.

Author: Walt Whitman
Quote: I have learned that to be with those I like is enough.

Author: Khalil Gibran
Quote: In the sweetness of friendship let there be laughter, and sharing of pleasures. For in the dew of little things the heart finds its morning and is refreshed.

Author: Friedrich Nietzsche
Quote: Love is blind; friendship closes its eyes.

Author: William Butler Yeats
Quote: There are no strangers here; Only friends you haven't yet met.

Author: William Blake
Quote: The bird a nest, the spider a web, man friendship.

Author: Herman Melville
Quote: Friendship at first sight, like love at first sight, is said to be the only truth.

Author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.
Quote: Without wearing any mask we are conscious of, we have a special face for each friend.

Author: Taylor Swift
Quote: All you need to do to be my friend is like me.

Author: Katherine Mansfield
Quote: I always felt that the great high privilege, relief and comfort of friendship was that one had to explain nothing.

Author: Elbert Hubbard
Quote: Never explain - your friends do not need it and your enemies will not believe you anyway.

Author: Mignon McLaughlin
Quote: It is important to our friends to believe that we are unreservedly frank with them, and important to friendship that we are not.

Author: Elizabeth Taylor
Quote: You find out who your real friends are when you're involved in a scandal.

Author: Honore de Balzac
Quote: Nothing so fortifies a friendship as a belief on the part of one friend that he is superior to the other.

Author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh
Quote: Men kick friendship around like a football, but it doesn't seem to crack. Women treat it like glass and it goes to pieces.

Author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.
Quote: Remember that a gesture of friendship, no matter how small, is always appreciated.

Author: Augustine Birrell
Quote: Friendship is a word, the very sight of which in print makes the heart warm.

Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
Quote: A friend may well be reckoned the masterpiece of nature.

Author: Alice Walker
Quote: No person is your friend who demands your silence, or denies your right to grow.

Author: W. Somerset Maugham
Quote: When you choose your friends, don't be short-changed by choosing personality over character.

Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
Quote: A man's growth is seen in the successive choirs of his friends.

Author: Thomas Fuller
Quote: If you have one true friend you have more than your share.

Author: Euripides
Quote: Life has no blessing like a prudent friend.

Author: Zora Neale Hurston
Quote: It seems to me that trying to live without friends is like milking a bear to get cream for your morning coffee. It is a whole lot of trouble, and then not worth much after you get it.

Author: E. W. Howe
Quote: When a friend is in trouble, don't annoy him by asking if there is anything you can do. Think up something appropriate and do it.

Author: Thomas Jefferson
Quote: I never considered a difference of opinion in politics, in religion, in philosophy, as cause for withdrawing from a friend.

Author: Thomas Jefferson
Quote: But friendship is precious, not only in the shade, but in the sunshine of life, and thanks to a benevolent arrangement the greater part of life is sunshine.

Author: George MacDonald
Quote: If instead of a gem, or even a flower, we should cast the gift of a loving thought into the heart of a friend, that would be giving as the angels give.

Author: Saint Augustine
Quote: I want my friend to miss me as long as I miss him.

Author: Dag Hammarskjold
Quote: Friendship needs no words - it is solitude delivered from the anguish of loneliness.

Author: King Solomon
Quote: As iron sharpens iron, so a friend sharpens a friend.

Author: Joseph Campbell
Quote: Love is a friendship set to music.
